tasks.instructions: You should spend about 40 minutes on this task
tasks.topic: Some people think that newspapers are the best way to get news. However, others believe that they can get news better through another media. Discuss both views and give your opinion?
requirements: Give reasons for your answer and include any relevant examples from your own knowledge or experience.
